alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Southern Inner Channels (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 5:38AM AKST until December 27 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...The eastern Gulf Coast, the central Inner Channels, the southeast Gulf Coast, portions of the northern Inner Channels, and portions of the southern Inner Channels including Juneau, Ketchikan, Sitka, Petersburg, Wrangell, Thorne Bay, Craig, Klawock, Hydaburg, Kake, Angoon, Gustavus, Hoonah, Tenakee Springs, Pelican, Elfin Cove, Port Alexander, Port Protection, Point Baker, Coffman Cove, Hollis, Metlakatla, Edna Bay, Naukati Bay, Whale Pass, and other nearby communities. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will depart the area through Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
